OOC: Yes Airly, the nWo is a faction. Dont take the 24 hour thing too seriously. But be sure the nWo is going to crush all others! The new era has arrived!

**********************************************************************
The preceding announcement has been paid for by the
New World Order


  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: airly2000 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, August 16, 2002 1:45 AM
  Subject: Re: 4 Life...


  It's a faction of this RPG or what?

  > All will join the ranks of the New World Order. You all have 24 
  hours to either comply or be destroyed. If you are not with us, then 
  you are against us.
  >
